subject: Fix OneSignal subscription and add PWA support for web notifications
body:
- Add explicit opt-in after permission granted to ensure users are properly subscribed to OneSignal push notifications
- Add PWA meta tags to web/index.html for improved mobile web experience
- Create manifest.json with app metadata for PWA installation
- Generate PWA icon assets (192x192, 512x512, apple-touch-icon)
- Add theme-color and Apple-specific meta tags for iOS support

This ensures notifications work correctly on mobile web browsers by:
1. Explicitly subscribing users via OneSignal.User.PushSubscription.optIn()
2. Providing proper PWA manifest for browser notification support
3. Including necessary icons for installation and home screen
title: Fix OneSignal subscription and add PWA support for web notifications
